title: When is Patch 5.8 coming?
body:
Isn´t it supposed to come out  today? or tomorrow?
Plz I need that Ryze rework 4 life.

replies.body: Not this week, 5.7 -> 5.8's going to be longer than the usual 2 week cycle.
Add taric rework to 5.8 and you are forgiven.
You really want Riot turning Tarics stun into a skillshot? The only reliable in-lane counter to Kalista.
NO. DON'T rework Taric. If you really have to at least make playing full tank Taric with iceborn gauntlet and cdr viable like it is now.

> [{quoted}](name=JimSteaks,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LFWZcPyI,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-04-22T12:32:20.648+0000)
>
> NO. DON'T rework Taric. If you really have to at least make playing full tank Taric with iceborn gauntlet and cdr viable like it is now.

You really want to keep bland mcblanderson in the game? I would rather they just scrap everything on his kit and give us a real one aka a rework.

So make him a Bard-level support that has to rely on and adc to be useful at all? I merely said make it so that playing him as a tank jungler or top is somewhat viable. So don't make him a Bard or Nami that is useless without others.
back in early s4 he was a very good top pick. They nerfed his shatter ratio, and that forced him back to bot lane.
Nami counters Darius top. She could use a buff, though, to some of her scaling. Late game, she feels weak, W has worse scaling than an AoE. It is not an AoE!

Are you kidding? Taric is so fun to play. If you build him straight armor tank against an ad team, nobody can kill you and you can duel some champions. Bopping people is so much fun, and being able to stun, lower their armor, ult, heal yourself. He's such a fun champion with a lot of good things in his kit. I personally love his ult. As a support, its a great skill. Plus, he's got some great skills to go along with him. He's the FABULOUS Gem Knight!

He's very arguably the most boring champion in the game-only Warwick can compete with him in terms of utter lack of interesting gameplay. On top of that, whenever he's a good champion he's basically mandatory because his kit has zero counterplay other than "never go in range of him ever". 

I wouldn't mind seeing a Taric rework at all.

> He's very arguably the most boring champion in the game-only Warwick can compete with him in terms of utter lack of interesting gameplay.

You mean Yi. Just press dat q button like no tomorrow
Yeah, I'm fine with a rework, just don't make him garbage like bard that can only be played support.

**When they will put Ao Shin :3 {{summoner:31}} **
Ao Shin... a wind dragon that makes tornados... hmm, Yasuo?
well if it takes that long just include the taric rework too and you are good to go.
No rework, but splash art update and texture re-balance in game. If they increased some of his ratios, I'd be cool with that.

The future. 

How do I know?
I'm a wizard.
